description:
At the end of the school day, Kazuho reminds the students that tomorrow is Parents` Day. Natsumi despairs at the prospect of her mother learning of her poor performance. Kazuho laughs and tells Natsumi it`s her own fault for not studying, but Natsumi says she`s also told her mother that Kazuho always falls asleep during their free study periods. Kazuho realizes that she could also be in trouble depending on how she conducts Parents` Day, so she frantically starts helping Natsumi study...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ハラハラする秋だった
